name: Dog Duty
summary: As some evil bigwig Octopus Commander and his army are threatening world-peace, it’s up to you and your squad of misfits to eliminate that octo-scum. Liberate outposts, defeat bosses and wreck these wicked squids up, but beware, they’re well-armed.
info:

  • 平台: PS4

  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
